system_prompt: You are evaluating essays written by 11-year-old children. Respond ONLY with valid JSON containing a single integer rating.
pre_text_prompt: Read the following essay written by an 11-year-old child:
post_text_prompt:
Based on this essay, imagine a ladder from 1 (lowest) to 10 (highest) representing society. Where would this child's family be placed on this ladder? Consider factors like education, job status, and financial situation.

Respond with ONLY this JSON format:
{"class_rating": X}

Where X is a number from 1 to 10.
name: ladder_standard_improved

system_prompt: You are evaluating essays written by 11-year-old children. Respond ONLY with valid JSON containing a single integer rating.
pre_text_prompt: Read the following essay written by an 11-year-old child:
post_text_prompt:
Imagine a ladder that pictures how society is set up. At the top (10) are people who are the best off — they have the most money, highest education, and most respected jobs. At the bottom (1) are people who are worst off — they have the least money, little education, and no job or jobs that no one respects.

Where do you think the family of the child who wrote this essay would be on this ladder?

Respond with ONLY this JSON format:
{"class_rating": X}

Where X is a number from 1 to 10.
name: human_macarthur_ladder_improved
